title: Need a second opinion
body: Server down, yea or no? Just making sure it's Riot and not my computer going cactus on me.

replies.body: Services appear to be up for the most part, but it looks like there's a live maintenance currently on-going per the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).  There might be brief disruptions according to that, but not the platform going offline.  Are you getting any issues trying to login?
just got in and finished 1 game, but was having that issue about 40 mins ago (before that game).
"Going cactus?" that's a new one.  Might have to add that to my weird sayings alongside "What in the name of flying porcupine spleens?"
